Individual.name: identify_exchange_partners
Individual.description: The action of identifying potential partners for resource exchange within the individual's social network.

required_variables.name: social_network
required_variables.description: List of individuals within the social network of the agent.

required_variables.name: trust_threshold
required_variables.description: Minimum trust level required to consider an individual as a potential exchange partner.

output_updates.name: exchange_partners
output_updates.description: List of identified potential exchange partners.

Individual.name: evaluate_exchange_value
Individual.condition: Potential partner and exchange value data available
Individual.description: The process of evaluating the potential value and risks of an exchange with a selected partner.

required_variables.name: exchange_partners
required_variables.description: List of identified potential exchange partners.

required_variables.name: trust_level
required_variables.description: Trust level between the individual and the partner.

output_updates.name: risk_assessment
output_updates.description: Assessment of risks associated with the exchange.

Individual.name: execute_exchange
Individual.description: The execution of the resource exchange between the individual and the partner.

required_variables.name: risk_assessment
required_variables.description: Assessment of risks associated with the exchange.

output_updates.name: exchange_history
output_updates.description: Updated history of exchanges made by the individual.

output_updates.name: resources_exchanged
output_updates.description: Details of resources exchanged between individuals.

Individual.name: update_social_capital
Individual.description: Updating the individual's social capital based on the outcome of the exchange.

required_variables.name: resources_exchanged
required_variables.description: Details of resources exchanged between individuals.

output_updates.name: social_capital
output_updates.description: Updated social capital of the individual.

Family.name: decide_education_investment
Family.description: The decision-making process regarding the allocation of resources for educational investments.

required_variables.name: collective_resources
required_variables.description: Total resources available to the family for investment.

required_variables.name: education_strategy
required_variables.description: The strategy employed by the family regarding education investments.

Family.name: receive_admission_decision
Family.condition: Admission decision received from educational institutions
Family.description: The process of receiving and processing admission decisions from educational institutions.

required_variables.name: application_status
required_variables.description: Status of the admission decision received from the institution.

Family.name: allocate_education_resources
Family.description: Allocating resources based on the received admission decisions.

EducationalInstitution.name: select_students
EducationalInstitution.description: Selecting students for admission based on predefined criteria.

required_variables.name: admission_criteria
required_variables.description: Criteria used by the institution to select students.

required_variables.name: applications_received
required_variables.description: List of applications received by the institution.

output_updates.name: selected_students
output_updates.description: List of students selected for admission.

EducationalInstitution.name: receive_application
EducationalInstitution.description: The process of receiving applications from families for student admission.

required_variables.name: application_data
required_variables.description: Data contained within the received application.

output_updates.name: applications_received
output_updates.description: Updated list of applications received by the institution.

Employer.name: evaluate_candidates
Employer.description: Evaluating candidates for potential hiring based on skill and cultural fit.

required_variables.name: candidates_list
required_variables.description: List of candidates to be evaluated.

Employer.name: make_hiring_decision
Employer.description: Making a hiring decision based on the evaluation results.

output_updates.name: hiring_decision
output_updates.description: Final decision regarding the hiring of a candidate.
